about.content2: I enjoy working in a team, where collaboration brings ideas to life, and I am also comfortable managing a project independently, ensuring its successful completion.
about.content3: I am committed to growing as a developer by learning from each experience and continuously refining my skills to deliver better solutions

project1Desc: an application to manage car sale,there is a landing page for the user and a dashboard for the admin to manage sale
